content: **drops crochet sleeveless cardigan in snow ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **size** xs s/m l xl xxl **materials** drops snow from garnstudio 200-200-200-250-250 g colour no 22 dark green 100-150-150-150-150 g colour no 45 army mix 100-100-100-100-100 g colour no 06 olive 50-50-100-100-100 g colour no 23 dark beige drops crochet hook size 10 / us n/p - or the size needed to obtain the correct crochet gauge drops buffalo horn button no 535 5pcs
